specialRules.name: Full Throttle
specialRules.effects: Consider the long straight maneuver template to be permitted in any gear. The long straight is not considered either hazardous or trivial in any gear.

specialRules.name: Pivot
specialRules.effects: At the start of the activation, if current gear is 1, this vehicle may make a pivot about its centre to face any direction. This pivot cannot cause a collision, and cannot leave this vehicle touching an obstruction.

specialRules.name: Full Throttle
specialRules.effects: Consider the long straight maneuver template to be permitted in any gear. The long straight is not considered either hazardous or trivial in any gear.

specialRules.name: Pivot
specialRules.effects: At the start of the activation, if current gear is 1, this vehicle may make a pivot about its centre to face any direction. This pivot cannot cause a collision, and cannot leave this vehicle touching an obstruction.

specialRules.name: Roll Cage
specialRules.effects: When this vehicle suffers a flip, this vehicle may choose to ignore the 2 hits received from the flip.

specialRules.name: Jet Engine
specialRules.effects: Count as having a Nitro Booster with infinite ammo tokens. Automatically explodes when it's wrecked. MUST use the Nitro Booster every time it activates.

specialRules.name: Nitro Booster
specialRules.effects: Rulebook, page 84.

specialRules.name: Slip Away
specialRules.effects: If this vehicle is targeted with a tailgate, T-bone or sideswipe smash attack, and this vehicle declares evade as its reaction, this vehicle may perform a free activation immediately after the active vehicle completes its activation. This free activation does not count as the vehicle’s activation this gear phase. Friendly vehicles can trigger this effect.

specialRules.name: Infuriating Jingle
specialRules.effects: Vehicles that target this vehicle with a SMASH ATTACK during a collision receive no hazard tokens during step 6 of the collision resolution.

specialRules.name: Uppers
specialRules.effects: If involved in a collision in which both declare an evade, both must declare a single stick-shift up immediately after the collision (gaining a hazard token as normal). If either vehicle is at max gear, the stick-shift does not affect his gear, but gain a hazard token.

specialRules.name: Downers
specialRules.effects: If he declares a SMASH ATTACK, remove 2 hazard tokens from the target, and reduce his crew by 1 until the end of the phase.

specialRules.name: Mobile Garage
specialRules.effects: If he starts its activation within medium range of one or more wrecks, it may reduce its crew by any amount, until the end of the game, to flip a single target wreck back over to an active vehicle. The recovered vehicle gains D6 hull points and 1 crew for each crew this vehicle reduced by this effect, up to a maximum of the recovered vehicle’s starting hull and crew values.

specialRules.name: All Terrain
specialRules.effects: This vehicle may ignore the penalties for rough and treacherous surfaces.

specialRules.name: Up and Over
specialRules.effects: After resolving a collision with a Bike, Buggy, Car, Pickup Truck, Performance Car, Lightweight Obstacle or Middleweight Obstacle during movement step 1.7, this vehicle may ignore the obstruction for the remainder of its movement step, driving over the top of it.

specialRules.name: Articulated
specialRules.effects: Rulebook, page 117.

specialRules.name: Piledriver Attack
specialRules.effects: Rulebook, page 121.

specialRules.name: Tanker Anchor
specialRules.effects: At the start of its activation, it may gain +1 hazard token to skip its movement step. It may then increase its gear by 1.

specialRules.name: Airwolf
specialRules.effects: At the start of its activation, it may make a pivot about its centre point, up to 90º.

specialRules.name: Airborne
specialRules.effects: Ignores obstructions, dropped weapons and terrain at all times, except that it may target other vehicles in its attack step. Other vehicles ignore this one at all times, except that other vehicles may target this vehicle during their attack steps. This vehicle cannot be involved in collisions.

specialRules.name: Bombs Away
specialRules.effects: Purchasing weapons, may count dropped weapons as requiring 0 build slots.

specialRules.name: Airwolf
specialRules.effects: At the start of its activation, it may make a pivot about its centre point, up to 90º.

specialRules.name: Airborne
specialRules.effects: Ignores obstructions, dropped weapons and terrain at all times, except that it may target other vehicles in its attack step. Other vehicles ignore this one at all times, except that other vehicles may target this vehicle during their attack steps. This vehicle cannot be involved in collisions.

specialRules.name: Bombs Away
specialRules.effects: Purchasing weapons, may count dropped weapons as requiring 0 build slots.

specialRules.name: Battle Taxi
specialRules.effects: Any weapon with the “Crew fired” rule gains the “Blitz” special rule when purchased for this vehicle.

specialRules.name: Blitz
specialRules.effects: This weapon may have any number of crew assigned to it during the attack step, and may attack once for each crew assigned. If weapon has ammo tokens, an ammo token must be discarded for each separate attack.

specialRules.name: Sardines
specialRules.effects: May not have its crew above 6.

specialRules.name: Up and Over
specialRules.effects: After resolving a collision with a Bike, Buggy, Car, Pickup Truck, Performance Car, Lightweight Obstacle or Middleweight Obstacle during movement step 1.7, it may ignore the obstruction, driving over the top.

specialRules.name: Pivot
specialRules.effects: At start of activation, if gear is 1, may make a pivot to face any direction. It cannot cause a collision, or touching an obstruction.

specialRules.name: All Terrain
specialRules.effects: May ignore the penalties for rough and treacherous surfaces.
